name: Nightmare Journal (RimaStudio)
description:
Jurnal Malam: A horror game made in Indonesia that is very scary.

Let's play games made in Indonesia right away, don't miss the quality of the game and the excitement of the game.

Gameplay:
The night journal is a game that tells horror stories in Indonesia with various themes and stories, in the game you will be someone who is very curious about mystical things so that you don't hesitate to find out and challenge them.
In the game you can interact with many objects, don't forget to pay attention to the tasks given, finish as fast as possible and always be careful

Game Features:
- You can play without internet
- Stunning graphics
- Unique puzzle
- Creepy music
- Language according to Indonesian local
- And many other interesting features

Please pay attention before buying this game, we recommend that you download the trial version to try it first before buying, because it is feared that the game does not match the cellphone used, is not supported, or is very heavy when played.

Minimum Specifications:
Snapdragon 636
4GB ram

Recommended specifications:
Snapdragon 845
4GB ram
